keywords.value: United States Agency for International Development
keywords.name: organizations

byline.contributor: Nida Najar contributed reporting from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: Residents of Bhaktapur told a search-and-rescue team that had traveled from Fairfax County, Va., that there was no one left to save in their shattered city after Saturday’s earthquake.

headline.print_headline: Trying to Save the Living, Nepal Rescuers Find Only Frustration
headline.main: Trying to Locate the Living, Nepal Rescuers Find Only Frustration

snippet: Residents of Bhaktapur told a search-and-rescue team that had traveled from Fairfax County, Va., that there was no one left to save in their shattered city after Saturday’s earthquake.
abstract: Team of renowned search-and-rescue workers from United States Agency for International Development travels to Bhaktapur, Nepal, to search for survivors of 7.8 magnitude earthquake, but team members are disheartened at finding none as window for survival closes.
